name: I want to be perfect
description:
In this game you are an imperfect been seeking to become perfect by attach to you the piece that you need.

                                         

Follow your dreams, fight and run! anything for the geometric perfection!



The Controls:

But you can also enter as a player 3º and 4º with a couple of xbox controllers!!

Once you select the number of players press space to start the game!

Power Up´s:

   The dash: it allows you to dash.

 Fortune Seeker: randomize the pieces on the map.

 Spooked: ignore all collisions, walls and gravity for a moments.

Game made in the 2018 LightBox Academy GameJam by:

  • Hector Gutierrez
  • Rocio Menor
  • Oscar Gonzalez
  • Daniel Ruiz
